001package src.pkg_rooms;
002
003import java.util.Random;
004import java.util.List;
005/**
006 * Randomizes room selection for the game.
007 * Can return either a predetermined room or a randomly chosen room from a list.
008 * 
009 * @author Pierre MATAR
010 */
011public class RoomRandomizer
012{
013    
014    private Room aAleaRoom;
015    
016    /**
017     * RoomRandomizer constructor.
018     * @param pAleaRoom The fixed room to return if specified, or null for random selection.
019     */
020    public RoomRandomizer(final Room pAleaRoom) {
021        this.aAleaRoom = pAleaRoom;
022    }
023    
024     /**
025     * Returns a random room from a list of available rooms.
026     * Ensures that the transporter room is not selected.
027     * 
028     * @param pRooms            The list of possible rooms in the game.
029     * @param pTransporterRoom  The room to exclude from selection.
030     * @return A randomly selected room or the fixed room if specified.
031     */
032    public Room getRandomRoom(final List<Room> pRooms, final Room pTransporterRoom) {
033        Random vRandom = new Random();
034        if (this.aAleaRoom == null) {
035            Room vRandomRoom = pRooms.get(vRandom.nextInt(pRooms.size()));
036            while (vRandomRoom == pTransporterRoom) vRandomRoom = pRooms.get(vRandom.nextInt(pRooms.size()));
037            return vRandomRoom;
038        }
039        return this.aAleaRoom;
040    }
041}
